channel.title: Trojans
channel.description: sorry if this is in wrong place. if you have auto restarter.exe in your server remove it. it has been detected as Generic Qhost!bo

item.title: Trojans
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

It was probably a false positive, and I don’t think these are even used much anymore.

Read full topic

item.title: Trojans
item.dc:creator: @spy_man47 spy man47
item.description:
@spy_man47 wrote:

Yeah, I think that happanes… and that happened to my server… but it is not a trojen… the untivirus tells some people that there is…

Read full topic

item.title: Trojans
item.dc:creator: @im_not_rich im not rich
item.description:
@im_not_rich wrote:

[quote=“ytuio9, post:2, topic:349299”][quote author=showpath link=topic=445673.msg3271619#msg3271619 date=1279245210]
sorry if this is in wrong place.
if you have auto restarter.exe in your server remove it.
it has been detected as Generic Qhost!bo
[/quote]
that’s not in all servers. some servers actually have an auto restarter that isn’t a virus. ironically, one of those servers was allstarscape v2…[/quote]
Yup you’re totally right, also Marvelscape 508 is a source that gives the same threat, but it’s not a virus.

Thanks for warning us all though

Read full topic
